children.comments: Identify your main traffic segments so you can zoom in your traffic statistics like hits, bandwidth, offload, response codes, and errors.
children.name: Traffic reporting

children.comments: Collect and analyze real-user data to monitor the performance of your website.
children.name: mPulse RUM

children.comments: Receive data about a user's geolocation and connection speed in a request header. If you change cached content based on the values of the X-Akamai-Edgescape request header, contact your account representative.
children.name: Geolocation

children.comments: Specify the level of detail you want to be logged in your Log Delivery Service reports. Log User-Agent Header to obtain detailed information in the Traffic by Browser and OS report.
children.name: Log delivery

comments: Control the settings related to monitoring and reporting. This gives you additional visibility into your traffic and audiences.
name: Augment insights
